title: Drive across this border with a QR code, no passport needed
description: Singapore will begin letting travelers drive through its border checkpoints with just a QR code in early-2024, without the need for passports.

title: ChatGPT and the new AI are wreaking havoc on cybersecurity in exciting and frightening ways
description: Unrestrained by ethics or law, cybercriminals are racing to use AI to find innovative new hacks, says Recorded Future CEO Christopher Ahlberg.
